# 生财有术知识星球整理 20190928

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shengcai-youshu-zhishi-xingqiu-zhengli-20190928
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shengcai-youshu-zhishi-xingqiu-zhengli-20190928
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shengcai-youshu-zhishi-xingqiu-zhengli-20190928
shengcai-youshu-zhishi-xingqiu-zhengli-20190928 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shengcai-youshu-zhishi-xingqiu-zhengli-erlingyijiulingjiuerba
shengcai-youshu-zhishi-xingqiu-zhengli-erlingyijiulingjiuerba <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
